entry.title: WIND WARNING , Leamington
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:48 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.2°C

entry.title: Saturday: A few showers. High 14.
entry.summary: Showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 90 this afternoon. High 14. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 40 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 90. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
